N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7051.1 - Policy

State Regulations

Pursuant to Correction Law, section 509, in order to
provide inmates incarcerated in local correctional facilities the opportunity
to visit family members when death is imminent and/or after death has occurred, at the discretion of the chief administrative officer, inmates shall be
permitted to visit the deathbed of and/or attend the funeral of designated
family members pursuant to the requirements of this Part. Notes
